directions: Place Lactaid(R) whole milk and powdered sugar in a blender. Blend for 1 to 2 minutes. Add the Lactaid(R) Berry Chocolate Crumble Ice Cream. Pulse 2 or 3 times to combine.
Pour into two chilled glasses. Drizzle with chocolate syrup and garnish with fresh berries.
ingredients: 4 scoops LACTAID® Berry Chocolate Crumble Ice Cream
title: Very Berry Chocolate Milk Shake
